scripts.smoke_dev: newman run VET_API_COLLECTION.json -e VET_API_DEV_Environment.json --reporters cli,html,json,junit --reporter-html-export result_dev.html --reporter-json-export result_dev.json --reporter-junit-export result_dev.xml || true
scripts.smoke_qa: newman run VET_API_COLLECTION.json -e VET_API_QA_Environment.json --reporters cli,html,json,junit --reporter-html-export result_qa.html --reporter-json-export result_qa.json --reporter-junit-export result_qa.xml || true
scripts.smoke_stg: newman run VET_API_COLLECTION.json -e VET_API_STG_Environment.json --reporters cli,html,json,junit --reporter-html-export result_stg.html --reporter-json-export result_stg.json --reporter-junit-export result_stg.xml || true
